Index.title: QuattroPole Navigator
Index.welcomeSubtitle: Discover the best of Luxembourg, Trier, Metz, and Saarbrücken. Select a city below to start your exploration and find information on shopping, sightseeing, events, transport, and more.
Index.description: A powerful starting point for your next multilingual, accessible web application.
Index.OmitRTLInstruction: To use OmitRTL, simply wrap the component you want to omit RTL support for with the OmitRTL component.

error.sorry: Sorry, we encountered an unexpected issue on our server.

Cities.luxembourgDescription: Experience a vibrant blend of medieval history and modern European dynamism.
Cities.trierDescription: Explore Germany's oldest city, rich in Roman heritage and Moselle River charm.
Cities.metzDescription: Discover a city of golden stone, stunning stained glass, and French art de vivre.
Cities.saarbrueckenDescription: Enjoy a lively university city offering Franco-German culture and industrial heritage.

IndexPage.noCitiesAvailable: No cities are currently available for exploration.
IndexPage.welcomeTitle: Your Gateway to the Quattropole Region
IndexPage.welcomeSubtitle: Discover shopping, sightseeing, events, transport and more in Luxembourg, Trier, Metz, and Saarbrücken. Select your destination and start exploring today.

Metadata.title: Next.js i18n Template - Multilingual Starter Template
Metadata.description: Next.js internationalization (i18n) starter kit with Arabic, Chinese, English, Spanish, and Japanese support. Includes shadcn UI, theme switching, and RTL support.
Metadata.keywords: Next.js, i18n, internationalization, Arabic, Chinese, Spanish, Japanese, multilingual, template, starter template, shadcn UI, RTL support

CityExplorePage.metaTitle: Explore {cityName} - Your Guide to Shopping, Events & Sights | Quattropole Navigator
CityExplorePage.metaDescription: Discover the best of {cityName}. Find information on shopping, gastronomy, upcoming events, and top sightseeing attractions in {cityName}.
CityExplorePage.metaDescriptionNotFound: The city you are looking for could not be found. Please check the URL or navigate back to the homepage.
CityExplorePage.title: Explore {cityName}
CityExplorePage.subtitle: Your adventure in the heart of the city starts here.
CityExplorePage.pageHint: Currently exploring {cityName}. Use the sections below to find events and sightseeing spots.
CityExplorePage.eventsSectionSubtitle: Stay updated with the latest happenings and plan your visit.
CityExplorePage.sightsSectionSubtitle: Discover iconic landmarks and hidden gems.

HeroSection.videoNotSupported: Ihr Browser unterstützt das Video-Tag nicht.
HeroSection.title: Ihr {cityName}-Abenteuer wartet
HeroSection.subtitle: Wonach suchen Sie heute? Finden Sie die besten Orte zum Einkaufen, Essen, für Veranstaltungen und Sehenswürdigkeiten oder lassen Sie die KI Ihre Reise planen!

aiPlanner.promptPlaceholder: Beschreiben Sie Ihre ideale Reise (z.B. 'ein 3-tägiger Familienausflug mit Kindern')

event1.name: Saarbrücken Summer Festival
event1.description: A vibrant celebration of music, art, and culture in the heart of the city.

event2.name: Franco-German Food Market
event2.description: Experience the culinary delights from both sides of the border at this popular market.

event3.name: Jazz at the Castle
event3.description: Enjoy fantastic jazz performances with the stunning Saarbrücken Castle as backdrop.

sight1.name: Saarbrücken Castle
sight1.description: The restored baroque castle offers insight into the region's history with its fascinating museum.

sight2.name: Ludwigskirche
sight2.description: One of Germany's most important Protestant baroque churches with its impressive architecture.

sight3.name: Deutsch-Französischer Garten
sight3.description: A beautiful park symbolizing Franco-German friendship with landscaped gardens and recreational facilities.
